CustomField.description: This field calculates the days in between the Quoted Date and the effective date of an opportunity. If the quoted date field is blank, the field will display -1.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field calculates the days in between the Quoted Date and the effective date of an opportunity. If the quoted date field is blank, the field will display -1.
CustomField.label: Days Quoted Before Effective Date
